snippet.title: Evolution of Baserisk (2019 - 2022)
snippet.description:
I plan to make a longer version of this video to give addition details for each version, With there being about 3 videos planned for that.
PS. I dont know why the 2022 versions audio is bugged, happened during the render process, not present in the game itself.

(I would have made this one more detailed, but I had to render it twice, since it crashed the first time, it took 2 hours to render it each time.)

Baserisk GameJam version was made in:
GMS: 1.4

Baserisk Revival Prototype was made in:
GameMaker 4

Baserisk SAGE 2021 Demo was made in:
Quake 1 Engine

Baserisk SAGE 2022 was made in:
Unity 5.4 + Nintendo 3DS License

Baserisk GameJam/Revivals assets were made in:
Game Maker Sprite Editor (For Graphics)
Freesound (for some sound effects)
OpenMPT (For the music, music made for another game: "Super Boss Gaiden", not mine)

Baserisk 2021 - 2022's assets were made in:
GIMP (Textures, Sprites, GUI)
OpenMPT (Music)
Audacity (For Audio Mixing and stuff)

Music credits for revival - 2022 go to:
@FLDE 

Vocal credits for Baserisk 2021 - 2022:
flappetap
Xieken
RinniFire
PeaceDragonVA

Some texture for 2021 - 2022 credits go to:
Shadesmaster

Some sprite credits for the gamejam version and revival version go to:
Sanio46

https://store.streamelements.com/digi-space_productions
